titles.title: To accept land into trust for the benefit of the Prairie Island Indian Community as compensation to the Tribe for Tribal lands that have been rendered dangerous by the use and storage of highly toxic nuclear materials, some of which also have been inundated by flood waters, to release the United States from related claims, and for other purposes.
The Prairie Island Indian Community Land Claim Settlement Act
The Prairie Island Indian Community Land Claim Settlement Act
The Prairie Island Indian Community Land Claim Settlement Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
